        "Samjna (Definition)",
        "Prakarana (General Principle)",
        "Tarka (Counterfactual)",
        "Nigamana (Conclusion)"
    ]
    
    # Tarka (Counterfactual Reasoning)

        "Suppose Dr. Kapoor is not a surgeon in this hospital.",
        "Then, Dr. Kapoor would not have completed a residency program.",
        "But this contradicts premise 2.",
        "Therefore, Dr. Kapoor must be a surgeon in this hospital."
